- If 0, equals .
- If greater than 0, follows .

Docs.summary: Removes all leading occurrences of a set of elements specified in a read-only span from the span.
Docs.returns: The trimmed span.

remarks.format:
## Remarks
If `trimElements` is empty, the span is returned unaltered.
